channel.title: Posts on Gamefacts
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Gamefacts

item.title: Battlefield 6 battle royale mode confirmed
item.description:
EA has confirmed the new mode on their latest community update. It’s not clear if the mode will make it on launch, but you can play test now through Battlefield Labs. For more information on Battlefield Labs and how to sign up, click here

EA mentions some key elements that differ from other BRs,

  • 100 player battle royale with squads divided into four teams of 25.
  • Players will instantly be killed if caught by the ring.

Read the full community update on Battlefield’s BR here

item.title: PlayStation Plus Game Catalog for September revealed
item.description:
The latest games coming to the PS Plus Game Catalog in September are,

  • Persona 5 Tactica (PS4/PS5)
  • Green Hell (PS4/PS5)
  • Fate/Samurai Remnant (PS4/PS5)
  • Crow Country (PS4/PS5)
  • The Invincible (PS5)
  • Conscript (PS5)

PS Plus Premium

  • Legacy of Kain: Defiance (PS4/PS5)

item.title: Dead Island 3 is in development
item.description: Developer Dambuster Studios confirms that Dead Island 3 is in development.

item.title: Nintendo Direct announced for this Friday
item.description:
The Nintendo Direct will begin at 6am PST/9am ET/2pm BST.

Where to watch?

  • Youtube
  • Twitch

item.title: Xbox confirms broadcast time at Tokyo Game Show
item.description:
The Xbox showcase will begin at 7pm JST / 3am PST / 6am EST / 11am BST.

Where to watch?

  • Youtube
  • Twitch

item.title: 007 First Light gets a release date
item.description:
Announced during Sony’s State of Play, 007 First Light gets new gameplay footage and will be available on Windows, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch 2, and Xbox Series X|S on March 27, 2026.

Versions:

  • 007 First Light $69.99 / €69.99 / £59.99
  • 007 First Light Deluxe Edition $79.99 / €79.99 / £69.99
  • 007 First Light Legacy Edition $299.99 / €299,99 / £259.99

The deluxe edition will be free for those who pre-order and includes 24h early access.

item.title: Update: Cyberpunk 2077 devs debunk any kind of announcement for September 4, 2025
item.description:
ORIGINAL

Fans online speculate that an announcement is coming for Cyberpunk 2077 on September 4, 2025 following a tweet from the developers which roleplays as N.U.S.A (The New United States of America) who are seeking to recruit netrunners to help against a cyber security threat.

UPDATE

CD Projekt Red debunks any kind of announcement. In fact, “it’s part of an activity tied to the Phantom Liberty anniversary”.

September 3

September 4

item.title: Borderlands 4 post-game roadmap revealed
item.description:
Borderlands 4 releases on Xbox Series X|S, PS5, and Windows on September 12, 2025.

Nintendo Switch 2 users will need to wait until October 3, 2025.

item.title: Atomfall's new DLC releases in September
Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 unveils year 2 roadmap
item.description:
• 4 new Operations & a new Siege map

  • 3 new Eternal War arenas

  • New Stratagems (PvE) and Helbrute Onslaught (PvP) game modes

  • New playable class: The Techmarine

  • New weapons and free unlockable weapon variants for existing weapons

  • New enemies and bosses

  • New Progression mechanics

This second year of content kicks off on September 4 with the release of Space Marine 2’s Anniversary Update, its biggest patch to date.

Read the full update here

item.title: PlayStation Plus games revealed for September
item.description:
The latest games coming to PS Plus in September are,

  • Psychonauts 2 (PS4)
  • Stardew Valley (PS4)
  • Viewfinder (PS4/PS5)

item.title: No Man's Sky adds new content
item.description:
The latest update allows you to build your own ship. See some of the highlights from the new update below.

Read the full update here

item.title: Skate reboot release date announced
item.description:
The new entry in the Skate franchise will be online only and free-to-play. It also launches with cross-platform and cross-progression.

skate. is set to release on,

  • Windows
  • Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S
  • PlayStation 4 and 5

item.title: Gears of War: Reloaded is out now
item.description:
Gears of War: Reloaded is available on the following platforms,

  • Xbox Series X|S (Game Pass included)
  • PlayStation 5
  • PC

item.title: Helldivers 2 out now on Xbox
item.description: Alongside the launch of Helldivers 2 on Xbox, Arrowhead Game Studios also released a Halo: ODST collaboration which brings new items to unlock for all versions of the game.

item.title: Ubisoft announces new Assassin's Creed Mirage DLC
item.description:
• New story chapter & missions set in 9th century AlUla
  • Gameplay improvements for the base game and the new location
  • All for free

item.title: Battlefield 6 gameplay changes post-beta
item.description:
Battlefield 6 just concluded it’s last beta session last weekend until full release on October 10th, 2025. Here are some of the changes coming on release. Visit the link below for the full list of changes.

  • M87A1 shotgun will now require more pellets to secure a kill.
  • Momentum, especially horizontal speed, carried from a slide into a jump has been reduced.
  • There is now a greater penalty for consecutive jumps.

Read the full update here

item.title: Bungie CEO is stepping down
item.description: Pete began working at Bungie in 2003, when it was still part of Microsoft. He became CEO in 2016 and has held the role until now. Justin Truman, who started at the company in 2010 and worked as a General Manager on Destiny 2, has been appointed as the new Studio Head.

item.title: High On Life 2 gets a February release date
item.description:
Squanch Games also released 42 minutes of gameplay. High On Life 2 is set to release on,

item.title: PlayStation 5 price changes in the U.S.
item.description:
Each bundle is increasing by $50

  • PlayStation 5 – $549.99
  • PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – $499.99
  • PlayStation 5 Pro – $749.99
